mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.`name` store_name, s.canteen_id, s.canteen_name, s.address, s.phone, s.score, s.logoUrl, s.attention, s.sales, s.description, st.tags_id, t.`name` tags_name FROM store s LEFT JOIN storetags st ON st.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN tags t ON st.tags_id = t.id

SELECT s.id, s.`name` store_name, s.canteen_id, s.canteen_name, s.address, s.phone, s.score, s.logoUrl, s.attention, s.sales, s.description, st.tags_id, t.`name` tags_name FROM store s LEFT JOIN storetags st ON st.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN tags t ON st.tags_id = t.id WHERE s.canteen_id = #{canteenId}

SELECT s.id, s.`name` store_name, s.canteen_id, s.canteen_name, s.address, s.phone, s.score, s.logoUrl, s.attention, s.sales, s.description, st.tags_id, t.`name` tags_name FROM store s LEFT JOIN storetags st ON st.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN tags t ON st.tags_id = t.id WHERE s.id in ( SELECT store_id FROM storetags WHERE tags_id = #{tagsId} )

SELECT s.id, s.`name` store_name, s.canteen_id, s.canteen_name, s.address, s.phone, s.score, s.logoUrl, s.attention, s.sales, s.description, st.tags_id, t.`name` tags_name FROM store s LEFT JOIN storetags st ON st.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN tags t ON st.tags_id = t.id WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, s.`name` store_name, s.canteen_id, s.canteen_name, s.address, s.phone, s.score, s.logoUrl, s.attention, s.sales, s.description, st.tags_id, t.`name` tags_name FROM store s LEFT JOIN storetags st ON st.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN tags t ON st.tags_id = t.id LEFT JOIN dishes d ON d.store_id = s.id WHERE d.`name` like #{keyword} OR s.`name` like #{keyword} OR t.name like #{keyword}

SELECT s.id, s.`name` store_name, s.canteen_id, s.canteen_name, s.address, s.phone, s.score, s.logoUrl, s.attention, s.sales, s.description, st.tags_id, t.`name` tags_name FROM store s LEFT JOIN storetags st ON st.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN tags t ON st.tags_id = t.id INNER JOIN collections c ON c.store_id = s.id WHERE c.student_id = #{studentId}
